mapper.select: select course.id, course.name, course.credit, course.department, course.info, course.course_type, course.status, course.fee from course join ( select course_id from teacher_course where teacher_id = #{teacher_id}) as temp_1 on course.id = temp_1.course_id;

select course.id, course.name, course.credit, course.department, course.info, course.course_type, course.status, course.fee from course join ( select course_id from student_course where student_id = #{student_id}) as temp_1 on course.id = temp_1.course_id;
select id from department where name = #{department_name};
mapper.insert: insert into course (id, name, credit, department, course_type, status, fee, info) values (#{course_id}, #{course_name}, #{credit}, #{department}, #{course_type}, #{status}, #{fee}, #{info});
mapper.update: update course set status = 'Ongoing' where id = #{course};
update course set status = 'Rejected',others = #{reason} where id = #{course};
